parameters.name: FuncId
parameters.description:
The ID of the feature.

For example, the ID of the origin host feature (set_req_host_header) is 18.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

Valid values: **1** to **100000**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of domain names to return on each page. Default value: **20**.

Valid values: **1** to **50**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
